What are the treatments for hypohidrotic ectodermal dysplasia ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of hypohidrotic ectodermal dysplasia:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: Hypohidrotic Ectodermal Dysplasia  - Genetic Testing Registry: Autosomal dominant hypohidrotic ectodermal dysplasia  - Genetic Testing Registry: Autosomal recessive hypohidrotic ectodermal dysplasia syndrome  - Genetic Testing
